projects.name: Let Me Check: General-Purpose Tracking App
bullets: Designed responsive UI and led development of a single-page progressive web app for mobile devices, allowing a wide range of tracking purpose and granularity.

projects.name: SecurityCentral - Red Hat
bullets: An Open Source web project, aims to improve the workflow experience of security workers in government.

projects.name: Personal Website 1.0
bullets: Created Personal Website Template by Vue.js and Pure CSS, also using the Vue 2.5 material design button library I am building.

projects.name: Cubicle: A Visuospatial Training Game
bullets: Analytic-driven 3D Educational Game built with University of Illinois Urbana-Champaigne researchers.
Work published on ACM IUI'18 Conference.

other.name: Vue Library for Material Design Button
bullets: Button component made with Material Design Motion (Tweening, Fading, Shared Transformation, etc.) on Vue 2.5.

other.name: NewsViz
bullets: Developed back-end of a meme-sourcing mobile Web App to pull out and cluster headline articles from Internet, using Django and ElasticSearch.

other.name: GlobalGameJam '18
bullets: A dating simulation game on PC. Made in GGJ Hackathon. Acted as lead programmer.

other.name: Music Fingerprint
bullets: Implemented algorithm of music feature extraction and search, and application UI in C++ with Qt Creator.

other.name: MiniSQL
bullets: with simplified SQL standard, supporting syntax interpreter, storage buffer and index operations by B+ tree.
